Title: The Adversary
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created for television by), Lisa Joy (created for television by), Halley Wegryn Gross, Jonathan Nolan, Dan Dietz (executive story editor), Charles Yu (story editor), Halley Wegryn Gross (story editor), Michael Crichton (based on the film written by)
Actors: Evan Rachel Wood, Thandie Newton, Jeffrey Wright, James Marsden
Plot: Maeve charms Felix; Elsie discovers evidence that could point to sabotage; Teddy and the Man in Black conflict with a garrison.
